FuncDef: The display storm control command displays the storm control information on an interface. The display storm control command displays the storm control information on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Displays the detailed information about storm control.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view information about storm control on broadcast, unknown multicast, and unknown unicast packets on an interface, including the packet mode, storm control action, and packet status on the interface.
